description: Description of what this test suite validates

tests.name: Test name/description
tests.input: Bicep expression to test (e.g., length([1, 2, 3])) - OR use bicepFile + functionCall
tests.bicepFile: (Optional) Path to .bicep file containing function definitions (relative to repo root)
tests.functionCall: (Optional) Function call expression when using bicepFile (e.g., myFunc(param1, param2))
tests.shouldBe: (Optional) Expected exact output - test passes if actual equals this value
tests.shouldNotBe: (Optional) Value that output must NOT equal - test passes if actual differs from this
tests.shouldContain: (Optional) Text that must appear in output - test passes if actual contains this
tests.shouldNotContain: (Optional) Text that must NOT appear in output - test passes if actual does not contain this
tests.shouldStartWith: (Optional) Text that output must start with - test passes if actual starts with this value
tests.shouldEndWith: (Optional) Text that output must end with - test passes if actual ends with this value
tests.shouldMatch: (Optional) Regex pattern that output must match - test passes if actual matches the pattern
tests.shouldBeGreaterThan: (Optional) Numeric value - test passes if actual is greater than this value
tests.shouldBeLessThan: (Optional) Numeric value - test passes if actual is less than this value
tests.shouldBeEmpty: (Optional) Set to true - test passes if output is empty string, empty array, or empty object
